name: Embed Docs – Elementor Files Addon,Elementor Docs Addon,Embed PDF, Word, PowerPoint and Excel Files in Gutenberg & Elementor
author: A1Office

sections.description:
Embed documents in WordPress plugin lets you embed any kind of files such as PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint with ease in your WordPress websites. You can not just embed but access the features of “show” and “download”.

Here is a plugin that can help you out with any kind of document that you may want to embed, show or download in your WordPress Website.

Demo

Click Here To see demo

How to Use ?

See, How easy Embed Docs plugin to use !

NEW IN VERSION 2.0.2

  • Fixed Elementor different Versions Compatibility.
  • Add Rate Now Functionality for users.

NEW IN VERSION 2.0.1

  • Fixed Elementor Widgets issues.
  • Compatible Embed Docs Widgets from Elementor Pro to Elementor Basic.

NEW IN VERSION 2.0.0

  • Embed docs feature is now also available on Elementor Basic Version. While using Elementor to Add/edit your webpages, you can use the embed docs plugin to embed files.
  • Embed any type of PDF file in Elementor.
  • Embed any type of DOCX file in Elementor.
  • Embed any type of EXCEL file in Elementor.
  • Embed any type of PPT file in Elementor.

How to embed files using ’embed docs’ plugin in Elementor?

  1. Start editing your page with elementor.
  2. From the widget tools, search and select embed pdf widget (or other widgets such as Docx widget, excel widget, or ppt widget) to embed PDF file (or Docx, excel, or ppt files respectively) into your web page.
  3. Choose and upload your pdf through the media library or URL-based upload.
  4. You can also customize your document view by choosing height, width, and alignment options.
  5. Once you are done with the page edits, publish to view the embedded files on your designed webpage.

ðŸ“‚ Supported file types

  • Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX)
  • Microsoft Excel (XLS, XLSX)

ðŸ“‹ Supported Viewers

  • Google Docs Viewer (PDF & Office Documents)
  • Microsoft Office Online (Office Documents Only)
  • Browser Native (PDF Only)
  • Google Drive Viewer (Stable and high performance viewer for documents hosted with Google Drive)

ðŸ”¥ Key Benefits of Embed Any Document WordPress plugin

  1. Easy to Upload and Embed. The plugin makes it easy to upload documents to your WordPress site and embed them in posts and pages. There’s no need to mess around with HTML code or shortcodes – simply select the document you want to embed, and the plugin will do the rest.

  2. Secure The plugin uses HTTPS to ensure that your documents are always transmitted securely.

  3. Compatible with all major browsers: The plugin is fully compatible with all major browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

  4. Simple and clean UI The plugin has a clean and simple user interface, making it easy to use.

  5. Free to Use: The plugin is free to download and use. The ‘Embed Documents in WordPress’ plugin is a free and easy way to upload and embed documents on your WordPress site.

Summary

Seamlessly embed, display and download PDF, Word, Excel and PowerPoint documents on your WordPress website. Its a free wordpress plugin that can help you to easily add any doc into your web pages and posts. Developed by A1Office that provides online editing and conversion tools such as pdf editor,docx editor, excel editor, xps to pdf, etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire embed-any-documents folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Done.

Upload or link the documents to your site using the â€˜Add Documentâ€™ button in the Visual editor.
sections.faq:
How do I embed a file in WordPress?

You can use a WordPress plugin like “embed docs” to embed your file in WordPress for free. It’s free and the easiest way to embed documents in a website such as Word, Excel, PDF, and other types of files into your WordPress posts and pages.

How do you embed an Excel File into a website?

If you want to embed an Excel file on your website, you can use a WordPress plugin like Embed Docs. This free plugin allows you to quickly and easily embed Excel files on your site. Simply upload your excel file into the media library, then select the excel file to upload using the plugin. Your file will be embedded in the post or page, allowing visitors to view and download it.

I have another question that you must add in your FAQ.

Sure, Do let us know if you have any other queries that we can solve. Just send us an email on connect@a1office.co
